name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Omaru Poruka Birthday Concert2024!! POL ROCK FES!!!!! [W25VvoWh5zY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Introduction sequence for 'POL ROCK 2024' featuring Omaru Polka and her band members.
MC section where Omaru Polka welcomes the audience and introduces the first song.
Omaru Polka performs her first song of the night.

subtitles.original:
OMARU POLKA
hololive 5th Generation
subtitles.english:
OMARU POLKA
hololive 5th Generation

subtitles.original:
POL ROCK 2024
Polka Birthday LIVE
January 30
In hololive Live Stage
subtitles.english:
POL ROCK 2024
Polka Birthday LIVE
January 30
In hololive Live Stage

subtitles.original: 見に来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thanks for coming to see me!

subtitles.original: 最初は、この一曲目から始めます。
subtitles.english: First, I'll start with this first song.

subtitles.original: Catch the Moment!
subtitles.english: Catch the Moment!

subtitles.original:
Catch the Moment
作詞: LiSA 作曲: 田淵智也
subtitles.english:
Catch the Moment
Lyrics: LiSA Composition: Tomoya Tabuchi

subtitles.original: そっと吐き出したため息を吸い込んだ
subtitles.english: I inhaled the sigh I softly breathed out

subtitles.original: 後悔は 苦い味残して
subtitles.english: Regret leaves a bitter taste behind

subtitles.original: いつもなんで 肝心なこと言えないまま
subtitles.english: Why do I always leave the important things unsaid?

subtitles.original: 次の 朝が顔出して
subtitles.english: The next morning shows its face

subtitles.original:
LIVE GUEST:
KUREIJI OLLIE, MORI CALLIOPE,
OURO KRONII, HAKOS BAELZ
subtitles.english:
LIVE GUEST:
KUREIJI OLLIE, MORI CALLIOPE,
OURO KRONII, HAKOS BAELZ

subtitles.original: 嫌になった運命をナイフで切り刻んで
subtitles.english: I'll carve up the fate I've come to hate with a knife

subtitles.original: もう一度 やり直したら
subtitles.english: If I were to start all over again

subtitles.original: 君に出会えないかも
subtitles.english: I might not be able to meet you

subtitles.original: 僕の声が響いた瞬間に始まる
subtitles.english: It starts the moment my voice resonates

subtitles.original: 命のリミット 心臓がカウントしてる
subtitles.english: The limit of life, my heart is counting down

subtitles.original: 叶えても 叶えても 終わらない願い
subtitles.english: Even if fulfilled, a wish that never ends

subtitles.original: 汗をかいて走った 世界の秒針は
subtitles.english: Sweating as I ran, the world's second hand

subtitles.original: いつか止まった 僕を置いていく
subtitles.english: Will one day leave behind the me that stopped

subtitles.original: あと何回君と笑えるの？
subtitles.english: How many more times can I laugh with you?

subtitles.original: 試してるんだ僕を Catch the moment
subtitles.english: It's testing me, catch the moment

subtitles.original: 一個ずつ幸せを数える旅に
subtitles.english: Every time I count each piece of happiness

subtitles.original: 変わっていく 未来に怯えてしまうけど
subtitles.english: I get scared of the changing future, but...

subtitles.original: 愛情の種を大切に育てよう
subtitles.english: Let's carefully nurture the seeds of affection

subtitles.original: 分厚い雲もやがて突き破るから
subtitles.english: Because even thick clouds will eventually be broken through

subtitles.original: 君の声が響いた 僕らの精神が
subtitles.english: Your voice resonated, our spirits...

subtitles.original: 呼んでいる 心臓のドアをノックしてる
subtitles.english: ...are calling, knocking on the door of the heart

subtitles.original: 臆病でも開けちゃうんだよ 信じたいから
subtitles.english: I'll open it even if I'm a coward, because I want to believe

subtitles.original: 何も無いと思った 足元に咲いた
subtitles.english: I thought there was nothing, but blooming at my feet...

subtitles.original: 深く確かな 根をはやす
subtitles.english: ...is a deep and certain root growing

subtitles.original: 嵐の夜が来たとしても
subtitles.english: Even if a stormy night comes

subtitles.original: 揺らいだりはしない
subtitles.english: I won't waver

subtitles.original: 何度でも追いついたり 追い越したり
subtitles.english: Catching up or overtaking again and again

subtitles.original: 君が不意に分からなくなって
subtitles.english: Suddenly I stop understanding you

subtitles.original: 息をしたタイミングが合うだけで
subtitles.english: Just when our breathing timings match...

subtitles.original: 嬉しくなったりして
subtitles.english: ...I start feeling happy

subtitles.original: 集めた1秒を 永遠にして
subtitles.english: Make the gathered seconds eternal

subtitles.original: 行けるんだ
subtitles.english: I can go on

subtitles.original: 僕の声が響いた瞬間に始まる
subtitles.english: It starts the moment my voice resonates

subtitles.original: 命のリミット 心臓がカウントしてる
subtitles.english: The limit of life, my heart is counting down

subtitles.original: 叶えても 叶えても 終わらない願い
subtitles.english: Even if fulfilled, a wish that never ends
